import Layout from "../components/MainLayout"; import fetch from "isomorphic-unfetch"; const Index = props => (

As at {props.stats.update_date_time}

Local (Sri Lanka)

{props.stats.local_new_cases}

New Cases

{props.stats.local_total_cases}

Total Cases

Go somewhere
{props.stats.local_recovered}

Recovered

  • New Cases:
  • Total Cases:
  • Deaths: {props.stats.local_deaths}
  • New Deaths: {props.stats.local_new_deaths}
  • Recovered: {props.stats.local_recovered}

Global

  • New Cases: {props.stats.global_new_cases}
  • Total Cases: {props.stats.global_total_cases}
  • Deaths: {props.stats.global_deaths}
  • New Deaths: {props.stats.global_new_deaths}
  • Recovered: {props.stats.global_recovered}
{props.stats.hospital_data.map(hospital_data => ( ))}
Name of the Hospital Cumulative count of individuals on treatment/observation Count of individuals currently on treatment/observation
Sri Lankans Foreigners Total Sri Lankans Foreigners Total
{hospital_data.cumulative_local.hospital} {hospital_data.cumulative_local} {hospital_data.cumulative_foreign} {hospital_data.cumulative_local + hospital_data.cumulative_foreign} {hospital_data.treatment_local} {hospital_data.treatment_foreign} {hospital_data.treatment_local + hospital_data.treatment_foreign}

Built and maintained by{" "} Yohan Dalpatadu . |{" "} GitHub Repository {" "}

Data Source:{" "} Health Promotion Bureau of Sri Lanka

); Index.getInitialProps = async function() { const res = await fetch( "http://hpb.health.gov.lk/api/get-current-statistical" ); const resData = await res.json(); return { stats: resData.data }; }; export default Index;
